attributes.action: abolish the compulsary R.E lessons for year 10 students and allow them to take an extra GCSE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that R.E should not have to be compulsary. We have to take our time to learn about other peoples cultures yet they do not learn about ours. Kids should get a chance to have an extra GCSE which they would enjoy instead of ieng forced to do one they wont
